adm:managed-object.name: password-modify-extended-operation-handler
adm:managed-object.adm:synopsis: The provides the ability for end users to change their own passwords, or for administrators to reset user passwords.
adm:managed-object.adm:description: The password modify extended operation is defined in RFC 3062. It includes the ability for users to provide their current password for further confirmation of their identity when changing the password, and it also includes the ability to generate a new password if the user doesn't provide one.

adm:property.name: identity-mapper-dn
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the DN of the configuration entry for the identity mapper that should be used in conjunction with the password modify extended operation.
adm:property.adm:description: This property will be used to identify a user based on an authorization ID in the 'u:' form. Changes to this property will take effect immediately.
